016package org.talend.sdk.component.api.service.http;
017
018/**
019 * The service you can use to create http clients.
020 */
021public interface HttpClientFactory {
022
023    /**
024     * @param api your proxy definition, {@link Request}.
025     * @param base the base url for the requests.
026     * @param <T> the proxy type.
027     * @return a http client ready to be used.
028     */
029    <T> T create(Class<T> api, String base);
030}
